0: on behalf of Barbara Doucette OLD ORCHARD BEACH, ME Erica Hebert Albair NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Sadly, the wonderful Doucette family had a house fire yesterday and lost everything, including their loving pets. Devin was taken to the hospital with 2nd degree burns and is out now recovering. Thankfully no one else was in the house so no other injuries. This family is just now starting on their long road on trying to get their life back. Barbara and Moe are avid members of the Old Orchard Beach commumity and are ALWAYS helping in any way they can. So many of us
